abstract: Reports that show how homeowners compared with their neighbors in energy use are found to encourage conservation.
snippet: Reports that show how homeowners compared with their neighbors in energy use are found to encourage conservation.
lead_paragraph: National Grid, the electricity and gas provider to several Northeastern states, last week announced the expansion of its Home Energy Report program, which delivers energy-use statements to homeowners showing how they stack up against their neighbors in similar-size homes.

headline.main: Utilities Finding Peer Pressure a Powerful Motivator
